code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Dashboard from'./components/Dashboard';import Filters from'./components/Filters';import Alerts from'./components/Alerts';import Table from'./components/Table';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[opportunities,setOpportunities]=useState([]);const[filters,setFilters]=useState({assetType:'',region:'',riskLevel:'',profitMargin:''});useEffect(()=>{const fetchOpportunities=async()=>{const response=await fetch('/api/opportunities');const data=await response.json();setOpportunities(data);};fetchOpportunities();},[]);const handleFilterChange=newFilters=>{setFilters(newFilters);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Arbitrage Opportunities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filters,{onFilterChange:handleFilterChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alerts,{opportunities:opportunities}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{opportunities:opportunities}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Table,{opportunities:opportunities,filters:filters})]});};export default App;
